metadata.name: Frosti Aurora
metadata.description:
As spring moves into summer and night moves into day, the existential beauty continues forever. 

These unique, 1-of-1 NFTs are accompanied by a painting, and stem from three of his major series, the 'Fictional,' 'Equestrian' and 'Abstract' series, captivating a strong visual language through 4k video animation in a digital realm. These NFTs will be accompanied with whitelist opportunities for Matsuyamaâ€™s future NFT projects.
